message: Let's start fair. Take $1000, and I'll take $9000.  We can negotiate further if you want.
That offer was way off. How about a more realistic split? 60/40 seems fair considering the circumstances.
Let's compromise. I'll take $7000, and you can have $3000.  It's still a better deal for you than last round, and we're getting closer to a fair split.
This is getting us nowhere.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option.  Let's just end this and both get something.
